items.title: What age should kids start coding?
items.content: Children can start learning coding concepts as early as 5-6 years old with visual programming tools like Scratch. Text-based coding is typically introduced around age 10-12.

items.title: Do I need prior experience?
items.content: No prior experience is needed! Our courses are designed for complete beginners and guide you step-by-step through the learning process.

items.title: How long does it take to learn?
items.content: Learning timelines vary by individual, but most students see significant progress within 3-6 months of consistent practice. The key is regular practice and building projects.
